backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, carts, orders, loyalty points, redemptions, and user profiles with admin/user authorization and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping product-related frontend files to implemented requirements and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind OKLCH color variables and base styling for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML root that loads the React application entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for catalog, product, cart, checkout, orders, rewards, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Wrapper that blocks or skeleton-loads content based on admin permission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate showing a login prompt when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login button triggering Internet Identity with loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccountSu: Renders a user account dropdown showing profile info, points, navigation links, and logout handling.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, auth-aware controls, footer, and content container.
frontend/src/components/SupportWhatsAppL: Button linking to WhatsApp support with a preset message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Defines cart-related queries and mutations for fetching, adding, removing items, and placing orders via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides product queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and toggling product activity via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains general user-related queries such as profile, admin status, points balance, and point redemption.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminProductsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, and toggling active status of products using various product-related hooks and form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, merges cart items with product data, allows quantity updates and removals, and shows totals.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows searchable and filterable product catalog with category tabs and empty-state handling for active products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays checkout summary, calculates totals, shows order items, and places orders via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message after order placement with links to continue shopping or view rewards.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Placeholder page gated by auth that displays a coming-soon message for order history.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info with image carousel, stock limits, and authenticated add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Loyalty rewards page that displays the user’s points, checks redemption eligibility, and allows redeeming 20 points for cashback or a mystery box via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them, supporting both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements and implemented features for the Ryk Cart e‑commerce app, including loyalty points, WhatsApp support, and admin tools.
